metadata.description: Test-driven development process with Given-When-Then pattern

sections.title: Test-Driven Development Skill
sections.introduction: Implements test-driven development methodology with Given-When-Then structured tests.
whenToUse: When developing new functionality with TDD approach
When creating unit tests for existing code

process.name: Understand Requirements
process.description: Clarify what needs to be tested

process.name: Implement Code
process.description: Write minimum code to pass test

process.name: Refactor
process.description: Improve code while keeping tests green

testStructure.given: Set up test data and preconditions

importantRules: Write test first - Never write implementation before test
One behavior per test - Each test verifies single behavior
Descriptive names - Test names should describe scenario
Independent tests - Tests should not depend on each other
